scripts.java: yarn docker:start && yarn java:test; yarn docker:stop
scripts.java:test: yarn java:create && yarn java:run && yarn java:report
scripts.java:report: yarn move:report && cd java && coverage-tests process-report --path ./configuration$( [ -z $APPLITOOLS_REPORT_ID ] || echo " --reportId $APPLITOOLS_REPORT_ID" )
scripts.ruby: yarn docker:start && yarn ruby:test; yarn docker:stop
scripts.ruby:prod: yarn && cd ruby && bundle install && yarn docker:start && yarn ruby:test:prod; yarn docker:stop
scripts.ruby:ci: yarn && cd ruby && bundle install && yarn ruby
scripts.ruby:test: yarn ruby:create && yarn ruby:run:parallel && yarn ruby:report:merge && yarn ruby:report
scripts.ruby:test:prod: yarn ruby:create && yarn ruby:run:parallel && yarn ruby:report:merge && yarn ruby:report:prod
scripts.ruby:run: cd ruby && APPLITOOLS_BATCH_NAME='Ruby Coverage Tests' APPLITOOLS_BATCH_ID=$(uuidgen) bundle exec rspec spec/coverage/generic
scripts.ruby:run:debug: cd ruby && APPLITOOLS_BATCH_NAME='Ruby Coverage Tests' APPLITOOLS_BATCH_ID=$(uuidgen) APPLITOOLS_SHOW_LOGS='true' bundle exec rspec spec/coverage/generic
scripts.ruby:run:parallel: cd ruby && APPLITOOLS_BATCH_NAME='Ruby Coverage Tests' APPLITOOLS_BATCH_ID=$(uuidgen) bundle exec parallel_rspec -n 10 spec/coverage/generic
scripts.docker:stop: docker stop selenium && docker rm selenium
